references.paper_title: An lp theory of PCA and spectral clustering
references.reason: This paper provides a theoretical foundation for PCA and spectral clustering, which are used as initialization methods in the proposed algorithms.
This paper discusses isotropic PCA and affine-invariant clustering, which are related to the problem of clustering under anisotropic Gaussian Mixture Models.

references.paper_title: Maximum likelihood from incomplete data via the EM algorithm
references.reason: This paper introduces the Expectation-Maximization (EM) algorithm, which is a fundamental algorithm for parameter estimation in mixture models and is closely related to the proposed clustering algorithm.
This paper introduces Lloyd's algorithm, a fundamental clustering algorithm that is adapted and improved in this paper to handle anisotropic covariance structures.

references.paper_title: Statistical and computational guarantees of Lloyd's algorithm and its variants
references.reason: This paper provides statistical and computational guarantees for Lloyd's algorithm under isotropic GMMs, which serves as a basis for analyzing the proposed algorithm's performance under anisotropic GMMs.
